results.name: Lengths of successive runs of 1's in the Thue-Morse sequence A010060.
comment: Also lengths of successive runs of 0's in the Thue-Morse sequence A010059.
Also lengths of successive runs of 2's in the Thue-Morse sequence A001285.
A variant of A036577, suggested by p. 4421 of Grytczuk.
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10922
Jaroslaw Grytczuk, Thue type problems for graphs, points and numbers, Discrete Math., 308 (2008), 4419-4429.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 05 2008
ext: Edited and extended by _Ray Chandler_, Aug 08 2008
